snippet: GIAMBOI--Joseph John III. Beloved son of Joseph Jr. and Eva (nee Sierra). Loving brother of Elizabeth. Cherished grandson of Mary and the late Joseph and Pablo Sierra and the late Eva. Reposing Scarpaci Funeral Home, 1401 86th Street, until Saturday, 9am. Mass St. Saviour Church, Park Slope, 10am. Interment Greenwood Cemetery. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GIAMBOI--Joseph John III. Beloved son of Joseph Jr. and Eva (nee Sierra). Loving brother of Elizabeth. Cherished grandson of Mary and the late Joseph and Pablo Sierra and the late Eva. Reposing Scarpaci Funeral Home, 1401 86th Street, until Saturday, 9am. Mass St. Saviour Church, Park Slope, 10am. Interment Greenwood Cemetery. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GIAMBOI, JOSEPH JOHN III
